song.title: Motrhigh 80s pop ballad mix
song.info:
Until now, I was lonely. My world was empty; I was nobody. Now you have entered, my life has changed: I don't feel bitter, I don't feel rage. But now I've got to leave. I'm not guilty. I don't need a reprieve. I see your face; the tears flow. I'm innocent. I have to go. Babe, I love you (I love you) I need you, I adore you (Adore you) I need you, I adore you (Adore you) But I just can't stay.
Babe, I love you (I love you) I need you, I adore you (Adore you) I need you, I adore you (Adore you) But I just can't stay. Babe, I love you (I love you) I need you, I adore you (Adore you) I need you, I adore you (Adore you) But I just can't stay. Babe, I love you (I love you) I need you, I adore you...
